column4: Thanks in advanceget xine up and running but iam not sure wat iam doing wrong
all iam trying to configure xine i have the xine-lib-1.1.0 and xine-ui-0.99.4 in my home directory i just need 2 know how 2 configure them if someone can help that would be great..
iam not sure wat iam doing wrong i have tryed some how to's but it still dont seem to work
i think iam just to noobish
what did you do? how did it fail?
i guess xine will just show up in the menu
perhaps the menu didn't immediately update
if a menu item doesn't appear, it will still be lots easier to create a menu entry than building xine from source
anyway, i wouldn't use xine-ui. totem has a nicer ui and it can use xine as the backend
xinetd has nothing to do with xine. remove it and install xine-ui
first, remove xinetd. then worry about xine-ui
xine-ui is in the universe repository. you probably haven't enabled it
